modeopen: Which Hydro evolution to use. 1=Kolb 2=Eskola 3=Nonaka 5=fKLN initial conditions
Which subset of parameters for a given hydro evolution to use. Only has meaning for WhichHydro=4 at the moment.
flag: Use viscous hydro if it is supported (currently only for Hydro:WhichHydro=5).
Fix the distribution to the initial one over the whole time (no hydro evolution, just initial profile).
parm: initial time for hydro evolution in fm/c Hydro:tau0 = 0.6
maximal time of the hydro evolution in fm/c Hydro:taumax = 10.6
time step in the hydro evolution data files in fm/c Hydro:dtau = 0.04
half the lattice length in fm in the hydro evolution data file: [-xmax,xmax] in x and [-xmax,xmax] in y Hydro:xmax = 10.
half the lattice length in fm in the hydro evolution data file: [-zmax,zmax] in z Hydro:zmax = 20.
step size in space in fm in the hydro evolution data file Hydro:dx = 0.1
step size in space in fm in the z direction in the hydro evolution data file Hydro:dz = 0.5
temperature at which to stop the evolution of the jet Hydro:Tfinal = 0.16
